Package com.mediLaboSolutions.T2D2Patient.controller

Class PersonController

java.lang.Object
com.mediLaboSolutions.T2D2Patient.controller.PersonController
@RestController public class PersonController extends Object
A class that receives requests made from some of the usual CRUD endpoints and specific URL for the Person.
Version:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • getPersons

      @GetMapping("/persons") public List<Person> getPersons()
      A GetMapping method on the /persons URI. It calls the eponymous IPersonService method and returns a list of Person model entities.
      Returns:
      A Person list.
      Singularity :
      Method created for testing purposes with Postman. Could be use for administration.

    • getPersonById

      @GetMapping("/persons/{personId}") public Person getPersonById(@PathVariable("personId") int personId)
      A GetMapping method on the /persons URI with a person id as PathVariable. It calls the eponymous IPersonService method and returns the Person model entity whose id is the one passed in parameter.
      Returns:
      A Person.
      Front-end calling method(s) :
      person.service.ts : getPersonById(personId: number)

    • getPersonByEmail

      @GetMapping("/persons/email/{personEmail}") public Person getPersonByEmail(@PathVariable("personEmail") String personEmail)
      A GetMapping method on the /persons/email URI with a person email as PathVariable. It calls the eponymous IPersonService method and returns the Person model entity whose email is the one passed in parameter.
      Returns:
      A Person.
      Front-end calling method(s) :
      person.service.ts : getPersonByEmail(personEmail: string)

    • createPerson

      @PostMapping("/person") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Person> createPerson(@RequestBody Person newPerson) throws Exception
      A PostMapping method on the /person URI with an Person model entity as RequestBody. It calls the eponymous IPersonService method and returns the Person added with status code 201. If the result is null, it returns status code 400.
      Returns:
      A Person and a status code.
      Throws:
      Exception
      Front-end calling method(s) :
      person.service.ts : createNewPerson(nesPerson: Person)

    • updatePersonById

      @PutMapping("/persons/{personId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Integer> updatePersonById(@PathVariable("personId") int personId, @RequestBody Person updatedPerson) throws Exception
      A PutMapping method on the /persons URI with an person id as PathVariables and an Person as RequestBody. It calls the eponymous IPersonService method and returns an Integer used by the front end to determine the success of the request, with status code 200. If the result is null, it returns status code 400.
      Returns:
      An Integer and a status code.
      Throws:
      Exception
      Front-end calling method(s) :
      person.service.ts : updatePersonById(personId: number, personUpdate: Person)

    • deletePatientById

      @DeleteMapping("/persons/{personId}") public void deletePatientById(@PathVariable("personId") int personId)
      A DeleteMapping method on the /persons URI with the a person id as PathVariables. It calls the eponymous IPersonService method and returns nothing.
      Singularity :
      Method created for testing purposes with Postman. Could be use for administration.
